医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
摄入更多大豆异黄酮的儿童表现出更好的思维能力和注意力一项新研究发现，从大豆食品中摄入更多异黄酮的学龄儿童表现出更好的思维能力和注意力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Children-consuming-more-isoflavones-from-soy-foods-exhibit-better-thinking-bility-and-attention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Children-consuming-more-isoflavones-from-soy-foods-exhibit-better-thinking-bility-and-attention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d150c951-06a5-4ef7-ac25-eb5cce5d41e2 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 12:58:27 -0400 Children consuming more isoflavones from soy foods exhibit better thinking abilities and attention
美国国立卫生研究院的科学家发现灵长类动物面部识别背后的大脑回路美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的科学家发现了灵长类动物的大脑回路，可以快速识别面孔。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/NIH-scientists-uncover-brain- Circuitry-behind-face-detection-in-primates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/NIH-scientists-uncover-brain- Circuitry-behind-face-detection-in-primates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c0c1949-ee9c-46e0-ba68-992c4f339530 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 12:52:58 -0400 NIH scientists uncover brain circuitry behind face detection in primates
研究为根据个人对常量营养素的反应定制饮食铺平了道路当谈到管理血糖水平时，大多数人都会想到计算碳水化合物。但不列颠哥伦比亚大学的新研究表明，对于某些人来说，考虑饮食中的蛋白质和脂肪可能同样重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Research-paves-the-way-for-tailored-diets-based-on-individual-responses-to-macro Nutritions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Research-paves-the-way-for-tailored-diets-based-on-individual-responses-to-macro Nutritions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38d7825c-9cc0-4a6b-9227-07f33478cac6 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 12:44:13 -0400 Research paves the way for tailored diets based on individual responses to macronutrients
可见光技术简化了关键药物构建模块的合成密歇根大学的化学家发现了一种利用可见光合成一类特别适合用于制药的化合物的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Visible-light-technique-simplizes-synthesis-of-key-pharmaceutical-building-blocks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Visible-light-technique-simplizes-synthesis-of-key-pharmaceutical-building-blocks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3480b9ce-1f96-408c-b778-72e89f52f7ad Tue, 02 Jul 2024 12:34:37 -0400 Visible light technique simplifies synthesis of key pharmaceutical building blocks
世界卫生组织建议采取一套全面的戒烟干预措施世界卫生组织（WHO）在第一份戒烟指南中推荐了一套全面的戒烟干预措施，包括卫生保健提供者提供的行为支持、数字戒烟干预措施和药物治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/WHO-recommends-a-compressive-set-of-tobacco-cessation-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/WHO-recommends-a-compressive-set-of-tobacco-cessation-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be045df5-5876-4712-885d-3404fcbe1ae4 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 12:29:41 -0400 WHO recommends a comprehensive set of tobacco cessation interventions
微创技术改善颅底肿瘤切除颅底肿瘤是神经外科手术中最难切除的肿瘤之一。目前的治疗方法是通过显微前经岩骨入路（ATPA）进行手术切除。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Minimally-operative-technique-improves-skull-base-tumor-removal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Minimally-operative-technique-improves-skull-base-tumor-removal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=367a6704-b8cb-4fd6-9181-bc096f687fdf Tue, 02 Jul 2024 12:16:39 -0400 Minimally invasive technique improves skull base tumor removal
算法可帮助医生识别高度侵袭性的面部基底细胞癌一种算法可以帮助医疗保健专业人员识别哪些患者患有高度侵袭性的面部基底细胞癌 (BCC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Algorithm-assists-doctors-in-identifying-highly-aggressive-form-of-basal-cell-carcinoma-of-the-face.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Algorithm-assists-doctors-in-identifying-highly-aggressive-form-of-basal-cell-carcinoma-of-the-face.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f486cfb-37b4-472b-b018-16063b580af2 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 12:03:46 -0400 Algorithm assists doctors in identifying highly aggressive form of basal cell carcinoma of the face
大脑研究揭示精神分裂症冷漠的原因精神分裂症影响着高达 1% 的人口，是一种以多种症状为特征的神经精神疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Brain-study-reveals-cause-of-apathy-in-schizophrenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Brain-study-reveals-cause-of-apathy-in-schizophrenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89b5bb93-f070-4638-a354-b67b89ccc50e Tue, 02 Jul 2024 11:56:40 -0400 Brain study reveals cause of apathy in schizophrenia
Senolytic 药物并不是一种“一刀切”的药物，可能会使一些老年女性受益梅奥诊所的研究人员发现，选择性杀死衰老细胞的药物可能对健康的老年女性有益，但并不是一种“一刀切”的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Senolytic-drugs-are-not-a-one-size-fits-all-remedy-and-may-benefit-some-older-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Senolytic-drugs-are-not-a-one-size-fits-all-remedy-and-may-benefit-some-older-women.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2231096a-f12e-412f-9277-8dc74bb60626 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 10:56:02 -0400 Senolytic drugs are not a "one-size-fits-all" remedy and may benefit some older women
使用小分子调节基因表达细胞的正确功能在很大程度上依赖于精细控制基因表达的能力，这是一个复杂的过程，DNA中包含的信息被复制到RNA中，最终产生细胞中的所有蛋白质和大部分调节分子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Modulated-gene-express-using-small-molecules.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Modulated-gene-express-using-small-molecules.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7daf9de-9962-4595-9a4d-d1786b433d09 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 10:50:00 -0400 Modulating gene expression using small molecules
